about_the_game:
There's no dragon is a strategy game in which you build and manage colonies against waves of invaders. The land is divided into sections all compose by ressources ready to be gathered, gain experience to expand on this hostiles land !

Build your army

Choose between three civilizations, each with its own skill tree featuring exclusive technologies and units. Move your soldiers to opposing camps to reduce their forces and establish your first line of defense !

Real time pausing

This is a real-time strategy game, but don't panic—you can pause the action to make strategic and tactical decisions! Place your structures and give orders to your units. Be sure to be prepared before the next wave !

Capturing regions

Clearing a skill level allows you to take control of a region! Each region offers clues about its resources, as well as the threat it poses. Send your soldiers to conquer the territory! Be sure not to lose your colonial counter, otherwise the entire region will slip through your fingers!

short_description: Alone on a plot of land with a few resources and a single building, your civilization will begin here. Exploit resources, explore and conquer other regions, develop technologies, and fend off relentless barbarian attacks. Everything is manageable: they don't have a dragon!
